(三) 掉毛与脱毛(alopecia)掉毛指全身性和局灶性毛发脱落,被毛变得稀疏或局部脱毛,皮肤裸露。脱毛指某一部位毛发生长受阻或由毛囊脱落,形成面积大小,伴有红斑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Latin from Greek alōpekia, literally 'fox mange', from alōpēx 'fox'

means.word_mean: 1. loss of hair (especially on the head) or loss of wool or feathers; in humans it can result from heredity or hormonal imbalance or certain diseases or drugs and treatments (chemotherapy for cancer)
